name: @aequum/nestjs
title: NestJS aequum framework toolkit
description: A framrework to build apps common components fast, easy and fair over NestJS

scripts.lint:fix: concurrently 'npm run lint:packages -- --fix' 'npm run lint:integration -- --fix' 'npm run lint:spec -- --fix'
scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --access public --exact -m "chore(@aequum/nestjs) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=beta --access public -m "chore(@aequum/nestjs) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=next  --access public --skip-git -m "chore(@aequum/nestjs) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=rc  --access public -m "chore(@aequum/nestjs) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish  --access public --npm-tag=test --skip-git -m "chore(@aequum/nestjs) publish %s release"
